content:
## n8n@0.84.1 For a comprehensive list of changes, check out the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@0.84.0...n8n@0.84.1) for this version.
**Release date:** 2020-09-23 - Additional endpoints can be excluded from authentication checks. Multiple endpoints can be added separated by colons
